com.dors.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dors.Job
      • com.dors.event.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InterruptableEvent, RecurringEvent, TimedEvent

    public abstract class Event
extends Job
    An event is the alternative to using task, the benefits of using an event in the tasks stead is that the event does the same job, however the Event runs on the same thread as the submission was parsed through, so therefore reducing any complications the user could potentially face using unsafe threading with DORS application

      • Fields inherited from class com.dors.Job
